div.head: 金刃所傷
div.div: injury inflicted by metal [objects such as a] blade

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: injury inflicted by metal [objects such as a] blade

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with TPSHF 金瘡 金瘡 , wounds inflicted by metal objects. Tai ping sheng hui fang 太平聖惠方 68: 凡金 刃所傷，不令著風即瘥矣， ”For all injury inflicted by metal [objects, such as a] blade applies: if one does not allow them to be affected by wind they will heal”.
